mapper.insert: INSERT INTO second_hand.chat_record(connection_id, sender_id, reciever_id, send_time, content_type, content) VALUES (#{connectionId}, #{senderId}, #{recieverId}, NOW(), #{contentType}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT sender_id, reciever_id, send_time, content_type, content FROM second_hand.chat_record WHERE connection_id = #{connectionId} ORDER BY id ASC
